result.markdown:
--- title: "user_study" format: html editor: visual --- ## Setup ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(readxl) library(foreach) library(stringr) library(dplyr) library(tokenizers) library(data.table) library(ggplot2) library(plyr) library(quanteda) library(SemNetCleaner) library(purrr) library(tidytext) library(tm) library(topicmodels) library(SnowballC) library(Matrix) library(text2vec) library(tidyr) library(janitor) library(GGally) library(formattable) library(kableExtra) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data <- read_excel("data/results-survey3.xlsx") data <- data[1:121] %>% filter(.[[18]] !='Yes') # not analysed any EEG method ``` ::: ## Up or down ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## Experience ~ tools ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} vec <- names(data[25:50]) %>% str_split_i(., "\\? \\[", 2) %>% str_sub(., 1, -2) software <- data[25:50] %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ vec) %>% mutate_at(vars(vec), function(., na.rm = FALSE) (x = ifelse(.=="Yes", 1, 0))) %>% cbind(data[20], .) %>% dplyr::rename(years = !!names(.)[1]) %>% filter(years < 50) %>% select_if(colSums(.) != 0) ``` ::: #### Tools and year of experince ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} a <- software %>% select_if(colSums(.) > 10) res <- a %>% dplyr::select(years, BESA) %>% group_by(BESA) %>% dplyr::summarise(mean(years)) %>% dplyr::rename(., Usage = BESA,BESA = `mean(years)`) cn <- colnames(a[3:length(a)]) for (i in 1:length(cn)){ tmp <- a %>% dplyr::select(years, cn[i]) %>% group_by_at(2) %>% dplyr::summarise( mean(years)) %>% dplyr::select(-1) colnames(tmp) <- cn[i] res <- cbind(res, tmp) print(cn[i]) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "Brainstorm" [1] "Brain Vision Analyser" [1] "EEGLAB" [1] "ERPLAB" [1] "FieldTrip" [1] "LIMO" [1] "MNE-Python" [1] "SPM " [1] "Custom scripts" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} res %>% t() %>% row_to_names(row_number = 1) %>% data.frame() %>% dplyr::rename(., not_used = X0, used = X1) %>% tibble::rownames_to_column(., "software") %>% dplyr::mutate(., not_used = round(not_used, 2), used = round(used, 2)) %>% dplyr::mutate(., status = ifelse(not_used > used, "younger", "older")) %>% mutate(status = cell_spec(status, color = ifelse(status == "younger", "green", "black"))) %>% kable(escape = F, booktabs = T) %>% kable_styling("striped", position = "center",) %>% add_header_above(header = c(" " = 1, "Years of user experience" = 3)) %>% kable_classic(full_width = T, html_font = "Arial") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Years of user experience
software not_used used status
BESA 7.74 8.58 older
Brainstorm 7.64 8.53 older
Brain Vision Analyser 7.74 8.00 older
EEGLAB 6.27 8.72 older
ERPLAB 7.46 9.08 older
FieldTrip 7.51 8.11 older
LIMO 7.57 10.50 older
MNE-Python 8.22 7.19 younger
SPM 7.71 8.58 older
Custom scripts 7.32 8.62 older
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # na.omit(data[51]) %>% nrow() # change others here # other <- c(rep("Custom scripts", each=9), "4DBTi", rep("letswave", 3), "mTRF", "RAGU", "IGOR Pro", "EEGProcessor", "ELAN", "WinEEG") %>% table(.) %>% data.frame(.) %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("soft", "sum_scores")) # data.frame(rowSums(t(software))) %>% tibble::rownames_to_column(., "soft") %>% # rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("soft", "sum_scores")) %>% # rbind(., other) %>% dplyr::group_by(soft) %>% dplyr::summarise(sum_scores = sum(sum_scores)) ``` ::: ## Number of used software #### and years of experience ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} software <- data[25:50] %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ vec) %>% mutate_at(vars(vec), function(., na.rm = FALSE) (x = ifelse(.=="Yes", 1, 0))) ny <- cbind(data.frame(rowSums(software)), data[20]) %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("n_soft", "years")) %>% filter(years < 50, n_soft != 0) %>% data.frame() ny %>% lm(data=., n_soft ~ years) %>% summary(.) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: lm(formula = n_soft ~ years, data = .) Residuals: Min 1Q Median 3Q Max -4.0538 -1.2453 -0.2453 0.8452 7.3026 Coefficients: Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) (Intercept) 2.34098 0.21896 10.69 < 2e-16 *** years 0.09043 0.02307 3.92 0.000125 *** --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 Residual standard error: 1.754 on 181 degrees of freedom Multiple R-squared: 0.07827, Adjusted R-squared: 0.07317 F-statistic: 15.37 on 1 and 181 DF, p-value: 0.0001253 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ny %>% ggplot(., aes(x=n_soft, y=years)) + geom_jitter() + geom_smooth() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### and self assessment ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} merge(data.frame(rowSums(software)), data[21]) %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("n_soft", "selfass")) %>% #lm(data=., n_soft ~ selfass) %>% summary(.) ggplot(., aes(y=n_soft, x=selfass)) + geom_violin() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## In search of single variable representing experience ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[1:2]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[4:5]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[3:5]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
